modName: No Enemies in Compass PLUS Color Markers
summary:
No enemiy red dots on compass for more immersion

and

Color themed markers for map and compass.
descriptionHtml:
SOME EXPLANATIONS:

If you want only color markers : USE eZe's Version
if you want only red dots gone use: no enemy on compass mod
if you want both, use my mod, because eZe (or any color map marker mod) and NoenemyonCompass are incompatibles (both uses hudmenu.gfx)

hudmenugfx: contains red dots gone, and color markers on compass.
map.swf: contains color markers in map only.





No enemiy red dots on compass for more immersion
and
Color themed markers for map and compass.

CITIES/PALACES RED/LIGHT RED
DRAGON TOMBS GREEN WITH RED EYES
MINOR CITIES/HOUSES YELLOW/LIGHT YELLOW
FARM RELATED GREEN
SEA RELATED LIGHT BLUE
CAVES BROWN


NOTE: If you experience SKYUI Error code #5 - Disable de MENU MAP in the MCM of SKYUI (Advanced Tab).

SORRY MY ENGLISH.
author: ELAF
